snippet: As investors looked ahead to a busy week of economic reports and central bank meetings, Boeing and JPMorgan Chase had some of the biggest gains.
abstract: Stocks start month of December strong, bolstered by positive economic data from Japan and Europe.
lead_paragraph: As investors looked ahead to a busy week of economic reports and central bank meetings, Boeing and JPMorgan Chase had some of the biggest gains.

headline.main: Stock Market Begins the Month With Solid Gains
headline.print_headline: Markets Begin the Month With Solid Gains
